articles.author: Paul P. Murphy and Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: Salman Rushdie remains hospitalized after stabbing attack as venue faces scrutiny over security
articles.description: The venue where renowned author Salman Rushdie -- whose controversial work has triggered death threats -- was stabbed Friday had rejected previous recommendations to toughen security measures, two sources told CNN.

articles.title: Breitbart Slammed for Doxxing FBI Agents Involved in Mar-a-Lago Raid
articles.description: "They published the names of the FBI agents, which serves no purpose other than opening them up to threats and harassment," said former federal prosecutor Renato Mariotti.

articles.title: What we know about the FBI Ohio office attack suspect
articles.description: It appears he posted messages on Trump's Truth Social before the FBI office breach.
articles.content:
The armed man who attempted to break into the FBI building in Cincinnati has been identified as Ricky Shiffer, the Ohio Department of Safety said Friday.

articles.author: Jay Wallis (WFAA)
articles.title: 'He was literally throwing it back' | Texas man found guilty of child sexual assault drinks water during verdict reading, dies afterwards
articles.description: Edward Leclair was facing 5 counts of child sexual assault related to one victim. While the judge read his verdict, he drank from a water bottle and died soon after.
articles.content:
DENTON COUNTY, Texas A Texas man on trial for child sexual assault who drank a mysterious liquid during his verdict died soon afterwards, according to the Denton County District Attorneys Office.

articles.author: From Josh Pennington, Daniela Gonzalez-Roman, and Philip Wang, CNN
articles.title: 11 killed, including 2 children, in Montenegro gun attack, report state media
articles.description: At least 11 people were killed, including two children, in a deadly mass shooting in Montenegro's southern city of Cetinje on Friday, according to state media RTCG.
articles.content: At least 11 people were killed, including two children, in a deadly mass shooting in Montenegro's southern city of Cetinje on Friday, according to state media RTCG.

articles.author: Candy Woodall, Katherine Swartz and Kenneth Tran, USA TODAY
articles.title: House passes Inflation Reduction Act, sends it to Biden
articles.description: The House passed the Inflation Reduction Act on Friday, a sweeping bill on health care, climate and taxes. The bill now goes to Joe Biden's desk.
articles.content:
• House passes bold climate and health care bill, capping a string of recent legislative wins for President Joe Biden.
